name: Cosmic Malfunction
description:
You are an astronaut who was traveling between star systems when your spaceship started malfunctioning. Most levers and buttons no longer work, only one remains. The button - Spacebar - is out of control its function keeps changing. Help is coming but many asteroids are also approaching. Destroy 100 asteroids to win.

Cosmic Malfunction was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 following the theme - Out of Control.

Controls

Spacebar - Accelerate / Rotate / Shoot / Navigate menus
